Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory672.jpg'}
{3: "You've been looking over your shoulder the entire way without seeing anything, so you decide to take a turn at the corner of the street."}
{3: "With it, you sense No.21's presence around!"}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLineSpreadNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLineSpreadNew.prefab'}
{3: 'Sure enough, No. 21 suddenly pounces from behind and gives you a bear hug. In turn, you give her a bear hug, too.'}
{3: "You smile and ruffle No. 21's hair as she struggles free and pulls out a slightly squashed gift box from her sleeve."}
{1: '1', 2: 'No. 21', 3: 'Got this for you while I was out hunting.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The Construct awkwardly offers the gift box with both hands, with a look on her face that clearly shows that she wants to hear a compliment from you.'}
{2: 'Thanks?', 3: '28', 4: "That's amazing.", 5: '29', 6: 'Is this chocolate?', 7: '30'}
{3: 'No. 21 twitches her ears with satisfaction.'}
{3: 'No. 21 swishes her tail all happy.'}
{3: 'No. 21 looks utterly surprised.'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'You said we were supposed to give people chocolate for holidays. I remember that.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: "No. 21 tried very hard, didn't steal a single bite. This one smells the best.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'How did you hunt for it?', 3: '37', 4: 'This sure is a big box.', 5: '37'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'There were a lot of people. No. 21 jumped higher than anyone else, so No. 21 grabbed the biggest one.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'She gesticulates wildly with her hands and feet to show you how it was done, then proudly puffs out her chest.'}

{3: 'Carefully weighing this massive chocolate box that feels like a solid bowling ball, you believe it\'d take you an entire month to go through it... The way No.21 sees it, though, "big" is probably synonymous with "good."'}
{3: "Could this be some special Valentine's Day edition chocolate from WGAA?"}
{3: 'As you untie the satin ribbon on the gift box, a voucher comes falling out that confirms your suspicion.'}
{3: 'The voucher read, "Truth Game: Answer Me Now Edition. Please answer the following questions within five seconds."'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: "Don't think we can eat that, can we?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'You explain how the game works to a confused No.21.'}
{2: 'It helps us get to know each other better.', 3: '53', 4: 'Tell me more about yourself.', 5: '53'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: "I want to know what you're thinking. Do you want to know what I'm thinking, too?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'Okay, I want to play this game.', 4: '1'}
{3: "You begin reading the questions from the ticket one by one off the voucher to No.21, who's sitting properly in front of you now."}
{2: '"Forest or ocean?"', 3: '59'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: "Forest. It feels nice to run there, and I don't like getting wet.", 4: '1'}
{2: '"Sweet or salty food?"', 3: '62'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: "Sweet? Salty? No. 21 likes anything that's edible.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'I want the little ones.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'Blue. No. 21 has lots of blue clothes.', 4: '1'}
{2: '"Past or future?"', 3: '71'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: "Future. I'm going to grow taller and dance on one foot while spinning circles on top of those big tall people.", 4: '1'}
{2: '"Like or dislike?"', 3: '74'}
{3: 'At the last question without a subject, No.21 falls quiet. A split second later, however, you find her tail right next to you.'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'No. 21 is doing very well now because of you.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'So like. Definitely a big like.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: "No.21 stands up for a stretch circles around you like she's on patrol, then pounces forward again with a suspicious smile that reveals her small, sharp fangs."}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: "So, No. 21 will mark you properly. Won't let anyone else have you.", 4: '1'}
